title: Startup Templates - EWOR
meta_description: Access a comprehensive collection of startup templates designed by industry experts, providing the tools you need to build and scale your venture efficiently.

templates.name: The EWOR Co-Founder Conversation Starter
templates.description: Over the course of your start-upâs existence, selecting a co-founder is one of the most important decisions you will make. But fret not, EWOR is here to help with the EWOR Co-Founder Conversation Starter!

templates.name: Co-Foundersâ Agreement
templates.description: This document outlines key terms and responsibilities between you and your co-founder, ensuring clarity and alignment from the start of your partnership.

templates.name: ESOP Template by FounderForge and EWOR
templates.description: A tool to help you manage your ESOP Pool.

templates.name: Financial Model - Pre-Seed
templates.description: This is a Financial Model Template for a Pre-Seed B2B SaaS business.

templates.name: Financial Analysis Cheat Sheet
templates.description: The most important types of financial analysis in the (pre-)seed context.

templates.name: Grant Opportunities List on Airtable
templates.description: Help us build this list and send additional recommendations to partnerships@ewor.com.

templates.name: Advance Subscription Agreement (ASA) for UK
templates.description: This is an equity instrument where investors invest money now but receive shares when these are issued at a future funding round.

templates.name: Advisor Agreement
templates.description: This is an Advisor Agreement you can use for your start-up.

templates.name: Convertible Loan Agreement (CLA) for Germany
templates.description: This is an instrument where investors initially provide a loan that is later either paid back or converted into equity when a predetermined event occurs.

templates.name: Dataroom Template - Full
templates.description: EWOR Data room template that founders can use for their pre-seed round - full version.

templates.name: Dataroom Template - Light
templates.description: EWOR Data room template that founders can use for their pre-seed round - light version.

templates.name: MOU
templates.description: This is a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) you can use for your start-up.

templates.name: TSA
templates.description: This is a Shareholders` Agreement (TSA) you can use for your start-up.

templates.name: LOI
templates.description: This is a Letter of Intent (LOI) you can use for your start-up.

templates.name: NDA
templates.description: This is a Non-Disclosure-Agreement (NDA) you can use for your start-up.

templates.name: Pre-Seed Term Sheet
templates.description: This is a pre-seed term sheet you can use for your start-up.

templates.name: Part-Time Employment Contract
templates.description: This is a part-time contract you can use for your start-up.

templates.name: Full-Time Employment Contract
templates.description: This is a full-time contract you can use for your start-up.

templates.name: Freelance Employment Contract
templates.description: This is a freelancer contract you can use for your start-up.

templates.name: Internship Contract
templates.description: This is a internship contract you can use for your start-up.

templates.name: Pilot Project Agreement
templates.description: This is to be used when you want to provide your product or service to a potential client with the goal of assessing the feasibility of a service or product.

templates.name: Simple Agreement For Future Equity (SAFE) with post-money valuation cap for USA
templates.description: This is an equity instrument where investors invest money now, but receive equity when a trigger event occurs in the future.

templates.name: The Ultimate Term Sheet Cheat Sheet
templates.description: In this Ultimate Term Sheet Cheat Sheet, we will explain what each term means, which you will need to negotiate and what the market standard is.

templates.name: Decision-Making Type Assessment Quiz
templates.description: A valuable tool for entrepreneurs seeking to identify their decision-making type.

templates.name: EWOR Productivity Bible
templates.description: How to become more productive as an Entrepreneur.

templates.name: The EWOR Pre-Seed Investor Deck Guideline
templates.description: This guideline is designed to help you create a well-structured investor deck for a pre-seed round that gains the interest of angel investors or venture capitalists.

templates.name: The EWOR Pre-Seed Unicorn Slide Collection
templates.description: We collected slides from former unicorn ventures to help you get your content right from your slides.

templates.name: The EWOR B2B Sales Deck Guideline
templates.description: This guideline aids you in crafting effective sales decks, covering key elements like product, market, value proposition, and pricing.

templates.name: Company OKRs Template
templates.description: This is a Company OKRs template you can use for your start-up.

templates.name: Company OKRs Example
templates.description: This is a Company OKRs Example you can use for your start-up.

templates.name: Investor Updates (B2B, B2C, B2C SaaS) Template
templates.description: This is a Investor Updates (B2B, B2C, B2C SaaS) Template you can use for your start-up.
